step.cmd: Grab your Hokie Passport so you can ride the bus for free. If you've haven't gotten it yet or misplaced it, be sure to grab a couple of dollars in change. It's 50 cents for a one-way trip on the bus.
Go to www.bt4u.org to look at the bus stops and figure out where you need to stop.
Walk up Heather Drive toward Tall Oaks Drive, and wait at the bus stop right ahead of you, next to the Briarwood clubhouse/pool.
If you've never ridden a bus before, all you have to do is pull the cord on the windows shortly before the bus approaches your stop, and then get off.
